summary: This is an email chain from November 2020 between FBI personnel discussing the need to contact a victim of Jeffrey Epstein who lives in Bogotá, Colombia, to invite her to a meeting scheduled for November 12th. It involves coordination between FBI agents and a victim specialist, with a request for assistance from Colombian National Police.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as the subject of the case for which the FBI is trying to contact a victim in Bogotá.

events.title: Scheduled meeting with Bogotá victim
events.description: The FBI is attempting to contact a victim in Bogotá to invite her to a meeting on this date.

keyFacts: The FBI was actively working to contact a victim of Jeffrey Epstein living in Bogotá, Colombia, as of November 2020.
A meeting was scheduled for November 12, 2020, which the victim was to be invited to attend.
Coordination involved FBI agents, a victim specialist, and a request for assistance from a vetted team within the Colombian National Police.
The email chain shows ongoing investigative efforts to reach victims years after Epstein's death.
